task.title: Jumping to a message's viewport position
task.shortdesc: The plugin saves the viewport position where every message got sent from. This makes it easy to have converstations about specific areas without having to describe what artboard you're writing about.

context.p: Currently, the saved position doesn't include the zoom level.

step.cmd: Press the button on the message you'd like to visit in the viewport

taskbody.result: The viewport scrolls to the message's location.
